name: Acid Burrower
shortDescription: A horse-sized insect with digging claws and acidic blood

features.name: Relentless
features.description: This adversary may activate twice in a GM move.
features.flavourText: They move with incredible speed.

features.name: Earth Eruption
features.description: Mark a Stress to have this adversary burst out of the ground, causing anyone within Very Close to make an Agility (14) reaction roll or be knocked over and Vulnerable until they next act.
features.flavourText: They burrow themselves deep and explode out from under you.

features.name: Spit Acid
features.description: Make an attack against all targets in front of the Acid Burrower within Close range. On a success, deal 1d20 phy damage and make their armor score is halved until the next time they repair it.
features.flavourText: The acid starts to eat away at your armor.

features.name: Acid Bath
features.description: When this adversary takes Severe damage, all targets within Close range are bathed in its acidic blood, dealing 2d10 phy damage. This ground is now covered in acidic blood, and any movement through it by another creature automatically deals 1d6 damage.
features.flavourText: As you strike them, you’re covered in their cold, corrosive blood.

name: Adult Flickerfly
shortDescription: A winged insect the size of a large house with iridescent scales and wings that move too fast to track.

features.name: Relentless
features.description: Flickerfly may activate three times in one GM move (still costs 3 action tokens).

features.name: Never Misses
features.description: All Evasion scores are halved (rounded up) against the Adult Flickerfly.

features.name: Flight
features.description: Flickerfly may move up to Far range as part of an activation while flying.

features.name: Whirlwind
features.description: Make a spin attack, slashing at all Very Close targets. On any you succeed against, deal 3d12+6 physical damage. Armor is only half as effective when reducing this damage.

features.name: Mind Dance
features.description: Spend a Fear to create a magically dazzling display that grapples the minds of its targets. All creatures within Far range must make an Instinct (17) Reaction roll. On a failure, the target adds a token to the action tracker and the Flickerfly learns a fear the target has.

features.name: Hallucinatory Breath
features.description: Activate the first time the Flickerfly takes damage. When triggered, the Flickerfly breathes hallucinatory gas on all targets in front of them up to Far range. Targets must make an Instinct Reaction Roll (17) or be tormented by fearful hallucinations. Targets whose fears are known to the Flickerfly have disadvantage on this roll. On a failure, the target takes 3d8+3 mag damage and loses 2 Hope.

features.name: Uncanny Reflexes
features.description: Flickerfly may mark Stress when taking damage from an attack within Close range to only take half damage (rounded up).

name: Apprentice Assassin
shortDescription: A low-level skeleton assassin skilled in stealth and deception.

features.name: Minion
features.description: For every 6 damage a PC deals to this adversary, defeat an additional minion in the attack’s range.
features.flavourText: You cut through them effortlessly, one to the next.

features.name: Group Attack
features.description: Choose a target and activate all Apprentice Assassins within Close range of them. Those minions move into melee with the target and make one shared attack roll. On a success, they deal 5 phy damage each. Combine this damage together.
features.flavourText: They descend on you, stronger together.

name: Archer Guards
shortDescription: Tall guards bearing a longbow and quiver with arrows fletched in the settlement’s colors.

features.name: Hobbling Shot
features.description: Make an attack against a target in Far range. On a success, mark a Stress to deal 2d8 phy damage and give the target disadvantage on all Agility rolls until they clear at least one marked HP.
features.flavourText: An arrow pierces your leg, knocking you to the ground mid-stride.

name: Assassin Poisoner
shortDescription: A cunning scoundrel skilled in both poisons and ambushing.

features.name: Grindletooth Poison
features.description: Targets that mark HP from a Poisoned Throwing Dagger attack are made Vulnerable until they clear one Hit Point.

features.name: Out of Nowhere
features.description: Assassin Poisoner has advantage on attacks if they are Hidden.

features.name: Fumigation
features.description: Drop a smoke bomb that fills the area within Close range with smoke, making all targets Dizzied. Dizzied characters add two tokens to the action tracker when they act, then are no longer dizzied.

name: Battle Box
shortDescription: A cube-shaped construct with a different rune on each of their six sides.

features.name: Relentless
features.description: May activate two times during a GM move.

features.name: Shifting Amalgamation
features.description: Spend a Fear to add +1d10 to the damage of any of the Battle Box’s attacks.

features.name: Randomized Tactics
features.description: Mark Stress and roll 1d6. The Battle Box uses the corresponding move.

moves.name: Mana Beam
moves.description: The cube turns and fires a searing beam. Make an attack against a target within Far range. On a success, deal 2d20 mag damage.

moves.name: Fire Jets
moves.description: The cube shoots into the air, spinning as it releases jets of flame. Make an attack against all targets within Close range. Any you succeed against take 3d6 phy damage.

moves.name: Trample
moves.description: The cube rockets around a Close area, attacking all within. Any it is successful against take 3d10 physical damage and are Vulnerable until their next roll with Hope.

moves.name: Shocking Gas
moves.description: The cube sprays out a silver gas sparking with lightning. All creatures within Close range must make a Finesse Reaction Roll (15) or mark 3 Stress.

moves.name: Stunning Clap
moves.description: The cube leaps and its sides clap, creating a small sonic boom. Any targets within Very Close range must make a Strength Reaction Roll (15) or become Vulnerable until this adversary is defeated.

moves.name: Psionic Whine
moves.description: The cube releases a cluster of mechanical bees whose buzz rattles mortal minds. All targets within Close range must make a Presence Reaction Roll (15) or take 2d10 mag damage that can’t be reduced by armor.

features.name: Death Quake
features.description: When this adversary marks its last Hit Point, the magic powering it ruptures in an explosion of force. All targets in Close range make an Instinct Reaction Roll (15) or take 3d20 magic damage.

name: Bear
shortDescription: A large beast with thick fur and powerful claws.

features.name: Overwhelming Force
features.description: Creatures that mark HP from this creature’s Claws attack are knocked out of melee.
features.flavourText: The flurry of claws send you flying backwards.

features.name: Bite
features.description: +1 Attack Modifier. Mark a Stress to make a bite attack against a target in melee. On a success, deal 3d8 damage and make them Restrained. They can escape on a Strength (14) roll.
features.flavourText: A powerful bite clamps down onto you, keeping you from moving.

name: Bladed Guards
shortDescription: Armored guards bearing a sword and shield painted in the settlement’s colors.

features.name: Shield Wall
features.description: The difficulty to move through anywhere within Close range around this adversary is increased by 1 for each Bladed Guard within melee range of one another.
features.flavourText: The line of guards in an immovable wall of stubbornness and armor.

features.name: Detain
features.description: Make an attack against a target within Very Close range. On a success, mark a Stress to make the target Restrained. They can break free on a successful attack against the adversary or on a roll with Strength or Finesse (12).
features.flavourText: They hold you with an iron grip and begin to lead you away.

name: Brawny Zombie
shortDescription: A large corpse, decay-bloated and angry.

features.name: Slow
features.description: It takes 2 action tokens to activate this adversary.
features.flavourText: A lumbering figure moves towards you in the darkness.

features.name: Rip & Tear
features.description: Make an attack on a target in melee. On a success, they are Restrained and mark 2 Stress.
features.flavourText: Your tendons pop as the zombie attempts to tear you apart.

features.name: Grab & Rend
features.description: When the Brawny Zombie has a target Restrained, make an attack against them. On a success, deal 2d20 phy damage.
features.flavourText: The zombie grasps you in its massive hands, crushing you.

name: BullFrog
shortDescription: An amphibious bull-sized hybrid with springing legs.

features.name: Tongue Strike
features.description: Make an attack against a target within Close range. On a success, deal 2d6 phy damage and pull the target into melee.

features.name: Powerful Gore
features.description: Mark Stress to leap forward, making an attack with the bullfrog’s horns against all enemies in a straight line within close range. Any that are hit take 2d8+1 phy damage and must mark one armor slot. This does not reduce any damage.

features.name: Leaping Dodge
features.description: Whenever an attack against this creature misses, the bullfrog may leap anywhere within Far range.

name: Cave Ogre
shortDescription: A massive humanoid who sees all sapient life as food.

features.name: Relentless
features.description: This adversary may activate twice in a GM move.
features.flavourText: They move with incredible speed.

features.name: Bone Breaker
features.description: When a PC uses an Armor Slot to reduce incoming damage from the Cave Ogre, it is only half as effective.
features.flavourText: The ogre can shatter armor as easily as break bones.

features.name: Rampaging Fury
features.description: When this creature takes Major or Severe Damage, they rampage. Move them to somewhere within Close range and deal 2d6 direct physical damage to anyone they would cross through to get there.
features.flavourText: Enraged by your attack, the enemy charges forward.

features.name: Hail of Boulders
features.description: Mark a Stress to pick up heavy objects and throw them at all targets in front of the ogre up to Far range. Make an attack roll against these targets. Any you succeed against take 1d20+10 damage.
features.flavourText: A boulder flies towards you, too large and too fast to run from.

name: Chaldworm
shortDescription: An armor-plated worm known for traversing solid ice to strike prey from below.

features.name: Frozen Delicacy
features.description: When killed, the worm can be harvested with a Finesse (14) roll for its succulent and highly nutritious meat, glandular oil, and armored plates. The glandular oil can be processed into Worm Oil, and the armored plates can be crafted into a Worm Shield.

features.name: Tunnel
features.description: While superheated, the Chaldworm can move through solid ice at a rapid speed, up to a Far distance per activation. It leaves a large tunnel in its wake.

features.name: Superheat
features.description: Mark Stress to secrete oil from its glands and superheat its headplate for the next hour. It glows white hot, dealing an additional 1d8 magic when it uses Thrash. The Chaldworm can only use its other abilities superheated.

features.name: Ice Breach
features.description: While superheated, mark a Stress to accelerate rapidly while under a target, bursting out of the ice and launching them into the air. As the ground rumbles, the target must first make an Agility (14) reaction roll or be made Vulnerable. Then, as the worm bursts out of the ice, it makes a melee attack with a +6 attack modifier. On a success, the target takes 2d10 phy and 1d10 mag damage, and is thrown into far range.

name: Chaos Skull
shortDescription: A bleached floating humanoid skull animated by scintillating magic.

features.name: Levitation
features.description: Chaos Skull levitates several feet off the ground and can’t be Restrained.

features.name: Wards
features.description: Chaos Skull is resistant to magic damage.

features.name: Magic Burst
features.description: Mark Stress to make an attack against all targets within Close range. Each target you succeed against takes 1d12 mag damage.

features.name: Siphon Magic
features.description: Spend a Fear to make an attack against a target within Very Close range. On a success, a target with a Spellcast trait marks 1d4 Stress and the Chaos Skull clears that many Stress. Additionally, on a success, Chaos Skull may immediately activate again without spending action tokens.

name: Construct
shortDescription: A roughly humanoid being of stone and steel assembled and animated by magic

features.name: Shifting Amalgamation
features.description: Physical damage dealt to the Construct does +1 Hit Points.
features.flavourText: The creature’s shifting form is vulnerable to the bolts of your crossbow.

features.name: Overload
features.description: Mark a Stress to add +10 to a damage roll this adversary makes.
features.flavourText: The construct swells with arcane energy, powering itself up.

features.name: Trample
features.description: +2 attack modifier. When this adversary moves during an activation, mark a Stress to make an attack against all targets in its path. On a success, deal 3d10 physical damage.
features.flavourText: They run towards you with reckless abandon, stomping everything in their path.

features.name: Death Quake
features.description: +9 attack modifier. When this creature marks its last Hit Point, the magic powering it ruptures in an explosion of force. Make an attack against all targets within Very Close range. On a success, deal 2d12 magic damage.
features.flavourText: As it falls, the magic within ruptures and explodes.

name: Courtier
shortDescription: An ambitious and ostentatiously dressed socialite.

features.name: Mockery
features.description: Mark a Stress to say something mocking and force a target within Close range to make a reaction roll using Presence (14) to see if they can save face. If they fail, they mark 2 Stress and are Vulnerable for the remainder of the scene.
features.flavourText: “Was that song written out of tune, or do you just play it that way?”

features.name: Scapegoat
features.description: Spend a Fear and choose a PC as the target. The courtier convinces a crowd or prominent individual that this target is the cause of their current conflict or misfortune.
features.flavourText: “From across the hall, you see a finger, bedecked in fine rings, pointing at you.”

name: Cryomantic Assembler
shortDescription: A heavily-bundled druid crafting ice and snow.

features.name: Living Ice
features.description: Spend a Fear to bring nearby ice to life. Roll 1d6 and create a number of humanoid sized chunks of ice animate as constructs based on the result.

features.name: Frigid Detonation
features.description: Mark a Stress to choose up to 3 Animated Ice constructs to detonate. Each one does 2d6 direct magic damage to all targets in Close range and is removed from the battlefield.

features.name: Icepack
features.description: When 3 or more living ice are in melee range of a target, mark a Stress to make an attack against the target. On a success, they take 2 Stress and are Restrained as the living ice grows over them.

name: Debtguard
shortDescription: A soul fused to armor to continue service beyond death.

features.name: Magnetic Accounting
features.description: When the Debtguard deals HP damage it may mark a Stress to cause the target to lose 1 handful of gold per HP dealt. The gold adheres to the head of the warhammer, increasing its damage by 1d8 for every 2 handful stuck to it.

features.name: Leverage Assets
features.description: Mark a Stress to detonate the head of the warhammer, sending gold flying like shrapnel. For every handful of gold adhered to it, deal 1d8 damage to all targets within Close range. Targets may make an Agility Reaction Roll (15) to take half damage.

name: Deeproot Defender
shortDescription: A burly vegetable-person with grasping vines

features.name: Ground Slam
features.description: Slam the ground, knocking any targets within Very Close range into Far range. Each character knocked back this way marks Stress.
features.flavourText: Their fists slam to the ground, and the shockwave sends you flying.

features.name: Grab and Drag
features.description: +2 Attack Modifier. Make an attack roll against a close target. On a success, spend a Fear to pull them into melee, deal 2d8+3 phy damage, and make them Restrained. This condition ends the next time the bruiser takes Severe Damage.
features.flavourText: They reach out with their vines and ensnare you, pulling you in.

name: Dire Bat
shortDescription: A wide-winged bat thrall/pet endlessly loyal to their vampire owner.

features.name: Flying
features.description: Attack rolls against this adversary while it is flying are at +3 difficulty.

features.name: Guardian
features.description: When any Vampire allies mark HP, you can mark Stress and have this adversary fly into melee with the attacker to make an attack with a +5 modifier against the creature that attacked the vampire. If successful, the target takes 3d20 phy.

features.name: Screech
features.description: Mark Stress to send a high-pitch screech out toward all targets in front of the Dire Bat within Far range. They must all mark 1d4 Stress.

name: Dire Wolf
shortDescription: A large wolf with menacing teeth, seldom encountered alone.

features.name: Pack Tactics
features.description: When making a Claws attack, if another Dire Wolf is also in melee range of the target, deal 2d10 phy damage instead.
features.flavourText: When they work in packs, they’re more bold, more vicious.

features.name: Hobbling Strike
features.description: Make an attack against a target in melee range. On a success, mark a Stress to deal 4d6 phy damage and make them Vulnerable until they heal a Hit Point.
features.flavourText: With a snarl, they lunge at you, sinking their teeth in deep.

name: Eeligator
shortDescription: Reptile-fish hybrids that vary in length, armed with powerful jaws.

features.name: Healing Skin
features.description: Mark Stress to heal 1 HP.

features.name: Pull Under
features.description: If a target is within close range of a body of water, spend a Fear to make an attack against them. On a success, deal 2d8 phy damage, then move both the Eeligator and the target into the water that’s within close range. The Eeligator pulls the target under, making them Restrained and Drowning. While Drowning, every token that is added to the action tracker causes them to mark a Stress.

features.name: Death Grip
features.description: Mark a Stress to make a Snapping Jaw attack. If successful, mark Stress to lock this creature’s jaw onto the target, dealing 1 additional hit point and making them Restrained until the Eeligator is dealt Major damage. When released, the target marks a Stress.

name: Elemental Spark
shortDescription: A giant fighter wearing borrowed armor, known for its fiery bursts and overwhelming tactics.

features.name: Minion
features.description: For every 9 damage a PC deals to this adversary, defeat an additional minion in the attack’s range.
features.flavourText: You cut through them effortlessly, one to the next.

features.name: Group Attack
features.description: Choose a target and activate all Elemental Sparks within Close range of them. Those minions move into melee with the target and make one shared attack roll. On a success, they deal 7 phy damage each. Combine this damage together.
features.flavourText: They descend on you, stronger together.

name: Failed Experiment
shortDescription: A magical experiment in necromancy gone wrong, leaving the zombie warped and ungainly.

features.name: Warped Fortitude
features.description: This creature is resistant to physical damage.

features.name: Overwhelm
features.description: When a target this adversary is attacking has any other adversaries also in Very Close range, Failed Experiment’s damage is doubled.

features.name: Lurching Lunge
features.description: Mark a Stress to activate Failed Experiment even if they have already activated this move.

name: Fallen Shock Troop
shortDescription: A cursed warrior wielding a powerful axe, dedicated to preserving the forest.

features.name: Minion
features.description: For every 13 damage a PC deals to this adversary, they also deal 1 HP to an additional minion within this attack’s range.

features.name: Group Attack
features.description: Spend a Fear to activate all adversaries with this name within close range of a target. This group moves into Very Close range and makes an attack roll against that target. On a success, they deal 13 damage per adversary.

features.name: Aura of Doom
features.description: A character that marks HP from an attack by this adversary also loses Hope.

name: Giant Beastmaster
shortDescription: A leather-clad warrior bearing a whip and massive bow, known for commanding and protecting companion animals.

features.name: Pinning Strike
features.description: Make a Longbow attack against a target. On a success, the Beastmaster may also mark a Stress to pin them to a nearby surface. A pinned target is Restrained until freed with a Finesse or Strength Roll (15).

features.name: Deadly Companion
features.description: Up to twice per scene, summon a Bear, Dire Wolf, or similar Tier 0 Beast under this adversary’s control. That beast appears at a Close range and immediately activates.

features.name: Two as One
features.description: When this adversary activates, you can also activate a Tier 0 Beast currently under this adversary’s control.

name: Giant Brawler
shortDescription: An especially-muscular giant wielding a warhammer larger than a tall human.

features.name: Bloody Reprisal
features.description: When the Giant Brawler marks two or more HP, immediately make a Warhammer attack against the attacker, if they are within range. On a success, the target takes 2d12+4 phy damage.

features.name: Battering Ram
features.description: Mark a Stress to have this adversary charge at an inanimate object within Close range they could feasible smash (a wall, a cart, a market stand, etc.) and destroy it. Any targets in Very Close range of the object must make an Agility Reaction Roll (16) or take 1d10 phy damage from the shrapnel.

name: Giant Eagle
shortDescription: A giant-sized bird of prey with blood-stained talons.

features.name: Flight
features.description: Giant Eagle’s Difficulty is +3 when flying.

features.name: Deadly Dive
features.description: Mark Stress to attack a target within Far range. On a success, the target takes 2d12+4 damage and is knocked over, making them Vulnerable until they next act.

features.name: Take Off
features.description: Make an attack against a target within Very Close range. On a success, the target takes 2d8 phy damage and must make an Agility Reaction Roll (14) or become Restrained within the eagle’s massive talons. If they are Restrained, the Eagle immediately lifts into the air to Very Far range above the battlefield while holding them. A Restrained target may make a Strength (14) roll to escape.

features.name: Deadly Drop
features.description: If the Eagle is holding a Restrained target and flying, they can drop them. This means the target is no longer Restrained, but they are falling. If their fall is not prevented by some means on the next action the PCs take, the target will suffer 2d20 phy damage.

name: Giant Rat
shortDescription: A cat-sized rodent skilled at scavenging and survival.

features.name: Minion
features.description: For every 3 damage a PC deals to this adversary, defeat an additional minion in the attack’s range.
features.flavourText: You cut through them effortlessly, one to the next.

features.name: Group Attack
features.description: Choose a target and activate all Giant Rats within Close range of them. Those minions move into melee with the target and make one shared attack roll. On a success, they deal 3 phy damage each. Combine this damage together.
features.flavourText: They descend on you, stronger together.

name: Giant Recruit
shortDescription: A giant fighter wearing borrowed armor.

features.name: Minion
features.description: For every 7 damage a PC deals to this adversary, defeat an additional minion in the attack’s range.
features.flavourText: You cut through them effortlessly, one to the next.

features.name: Group Attack
features.description: Choose a target and activate all Giant Recruits within Close range of them. Those minions move into melee with the target and make one shared attack roll. On a success, they deal 6 phy damage each. Combine this damage together.
features.flavourText: They descend on you, stronger together.

name: Giant Scorpion
shortDescription: A human-sized insect with tearing claws and a stinging tail.

features.name: Double Strike
features.description: Mark a Stress to make a Pincers attack against two targets within range. On a success, deal 2d8 phy damage to each.
features.flavourText: Their massive claws strike out at both of you.

features.name: Venomous Stinger
features.description: Make an attack against a target within Very Close range. On a success, spend a Fear to deal 2d8 phy damage and Envenomate them. While Envenomated, before they make an action roll, they must roll a d6. If the result is a 4 or below, they mark a stress. Envenomated clears at their next short rest or on a successful Knowledge (16) roll.
features.flavourText: You feel the hot venom rush through your veins.

name: Glass Snake
shortDescription: A clear serpent with a head the size of a human that leaves behind a glass shard trail wherever it goes.

features.name: Armor Shredding Shards
features.description: Any successful melee attacks against this creature also mark an armor slot on the attacker.
features.flavourText: Though the strike hits true, its glass scales shred your armor.

features.name: Spinning Serpent
features.description: Mark a Stress to make an attack against all targets within Very Close range. Any target hit takes 1d8+3 phy damage.
features.flavourText: It spins violently, its sharp body striking in every direction.

features.name: Spitter
features.description: Spend a Fear to introduce a Spitter d6 die. Anytime the Glass Snake activates, roll this die. On a 5+, all targets in front of the snake within Far range must succeed on an Agility Reaction (14) or take 1d10+1 damage. This does not use the snake’s activation.
features.flavourText: Hundreds of shards of pearlescent glass spiral towards you.

name: Greater Earth Elemental
shortDescription: A living landslide of boulders and dust

features.name: Slow
features.description: This adversary costs 2 action tokens to activate.

features.name: Immovable Object
features.description: Any attack that would move Greater Earth Elemental moves it two fewer ranges (Far becomes Very Close, etc.) Whenever Greater Earth Elemental takes physical damage, reduce that damage by 2d6.

features.name: Rockslide
features.description: Spend a Fear to create a rockslide in the Close area in front of Greater Earth Elemental. All creatures in this area must make an Agility Reaction Roll (19) or take 5d10 physical damage and become Vulnerable until their next roll with Hope. On a successful reaction roll, they take half damage.

name: Greater Water Elemental
shortDescription: A living wave that crashed down upon enemies.

features.name: High Tide
features.description: On a successful Crashing Wave attack, mark a Stress to also knock the target back to Close range.

features.name: Waterlog
features.description: Mark a Stress to attack a Very Close target with a jet of water. On a success, deal 2d10 phy and their next action has disadvantage. On a failure, the target must mark a Stress.

features.name: Drowning Embrace
features.description: Spend a Fear to make an attack against all targets within Very Close range. Any targets hit by the attack become Vulnerable as they feel that they are drowning –as if submerged in water. The target may end this condition with a Knowledge (17) roll.

name: Green Ooze
shortDescription: A moving mound of translucent green slime.

features.name: Slow
features.description: The GM must spend two tokens to activate this adversary.
features.flavourText: They take a moment to react, and you can tell they’re not as quick as you are.

features.name: Acidic Form
features.description: Any successful melee attacks this creature makes also marks an Armor Slot on the target. This doesn’t reduce any damage.
features.flavourText: The residue eats away at your armor, corroding it slowly.

features.name: Envelop
features.description: Make an attack against a target in melee. On a success, envelop them, immediately dealing 2 Stress. Every time an action token is placed on the tracker, deal an additional Stress. They will break free the next time the ooze takes Severe damage.
features.flavourText: The ooze encircles you, drawing you into its gelatinous form.

features.name: Split
features.description: When this adversary marks its 3rd Hit Point, spend a Fear to split it into two Tiny Green Oozes (with no marked Hit Points or Stress). They may immediately activate without spending tokens.
features.flavourText: You watch as the damage you’ve done splits it in half… becoming two oozes instead of one.

name: Harrier
shortDescription: A nimble fighter armed with javelins, known for harrying and kiting opponents on the battlefield.

features.name: Maintain Distance
features.description: After making an attack, Harrier may move anywhere within Far range.
features.flavourText: They move with purpose across the battlefield, away from the fray.

features.name: Fall Back
features.description: When a PC moves into melee to make an attack, Harrier may mark Stress before the attack roll to move anywhere within Close range and make a Javelin attack on them. A success deals 1d8+2 phy damage.
features.flavourText: They won’t let you get close, instead turning an attack back on you.

name: Head Guard
shortDescription: A seasoned guard with a mace, whistle, and a bellowing voice.

features.name: Rally Guards
features.description: Spend a Fear to activate Head Guard and up to 2d4 allies with Far range, without spending additional action tokens.

features.name: On My Signal
features.description: Activate when this creature sees any number of hostile targets. It ticks down anytime a PC makes an attack roll. When triggered, all Archer Guards within Far range fire at their nearest target with a +3 attack modifier instead of their standard attack modifier.
features.flavourText: With the wave of a hand, a rain of arrows falls down upon you.

name: Head Vampire
shortDescription: A captivating aristocratic undead, dressed in aristocratic finery.

features.name: Feed on Followers
features.description: When this creature is in melee with a follower (any allied adversary), they may deal 1 HP to them to clear 2 HP on themselves.

features.name: The Hunt is On
features.description: Spend a Fear to summon 1d4 Vampires, who appear at Far range. All of these Vampires immediately activate.

features.name: Lifesuck
features.description: Every time this adversary activates, roll a d8. On a 6+, all targets within Very Close range lose 1 HP.

features.name: Look Into My Eyes
features.description: Any targets who enter melee range of the Head Vampire have to make an Instinct Reaction Roll (19) or place an action token on the tracker.
features.flavourText: "Oh, you got lost for a moment didn’t you?"

name: Huge Green Ooze
shortDescription: A towering mass of acidic green slime, capable of enveloping and dissolving its prey.

features.name: Slow
features.description: The GM must spend two initiative tokens to activate Huge Green Ooze.

features.name: Acidic Form
features.description: Any creature damaged by Huge Green Ooze must also mark one Armor Slot. This does not reduce any damage.

features.name: Envelop
features.description: Make an attack against a target in melee. On a success, envelop them, immediately dealing 2 Stress. Every time an action token is placed on the tracker, deal an additional Stress. They will break free the next time the ooze takes Severe damage.
features.flavourText: The ooze encircles you, drawing you into its gelatinous form.

features.name: Split
features.description: When this adversary marks its 4th Hit Point, spend a Fear to split it into two Green Oozes (with no marked HP or Stress) that instantly activate.
features.flavourText: The ooze divides and multiplies, overwhelming its foes.

name: Hydra
shortDescription: A quadrupedal scaled beast with multiple long-necked heads, each filled with menacing fangs.

features.name: Many-Headed Menace
features.description: Hydra begins with three heads. Each time the Hydra takes Major or higher damage, it loses a head.

features.name: Relentless
features.description: Hydra may activate X times per GM move, where X is the Hydra’s number of heads.

features.name: Regeneration
features.description: If the Hydra has any marked HP, spend a Fear to heal 2 HP and regrow a head.

features.name: Terrifying Chorus
features.description: All targets within Far range lose 2 Hope.

features.name: Magical Weakness
features.description: When the Hydra takes magic damage, they are Dazed. While Dazed, they can’t use Regeneration but are immune to magic damage. Every time the Hydra activates while Dazed, roll 1d8. On a 7+, they are no longer Dazed.

name: Icepack Graveship
shortDescription: A haunting entity formed from the remnants of a doomed ship and the souls of the departed.

features.name: Skeleton Crew
features.description: Whenever the graveship takes HP damage, a Skeleton Dredge emerges within Close range of the attacker and immediately activates.

features.name: Soul Shackle
features.description: Creatures with a soul that are killed by the graveship or its crew are added to its roster. Each time a soul is added to the crew, Icepack Graveship clears 1 Stress.
features.flavourText: Bound by the souls it consumes, the graveship grows stronger.

features.name: Load Cannon
features.description: Load the onboard cannon to prepare it for firing.

features.name: Fire Cannon
features.description: If the cannon is loaded, choose a target or group within Far range and make an attack. On a success, they take 3d20 phy damage. When fired, the cannon becomes unloaded.

features.name: Ship Shape
features.description: When the graveship has 3 or less HP available it can mark a Stress to reform into a ship to quickly escape. It cannot attack but can move quickly across and through solid ice (a Far distance per activation), leaving a wake of broken ice chunks behind it. Difficult to follow, easy to track (Insight 10).

name: Jagged Knife Bandit
shortDescription: A cunning criminal in a heavy cloak bearing one of the gang’s iconic knives.

features.name: Climber
features.description: This adversary can climb just as easily as they can run.
features.flavourText: They get to higher ground.

features.name: From Above
features.description: Make an attack from above a target. On a success, deal 3d10 physical damage.
features.flavourText: They drop in from above and take no mercy.

name: Jagged Knife Hexer
shortDescription: A staff-wielding bandit in a cloak, adorned with magical paraphernalia, using curses to vex their foes.

features.name: Curse
features.description: Target a creature within Far range and make them Cursed. While Cursed, on any rolls made with Hope, this adversary can mark a Stress to make it with Fear instead.
features.flavourText: A wave of nausea passes over you, as you realize you’ve been cursed.

features.name: Chaotic Flux
features.description: +2 attack modifier. Make an attack against up to three targets within Very Close range. Mark a Stress to deal 2d6 magic damage to any you are successful against.
features.flavourText: They unleash a flurry of writhing magic in all directions.

name: Jagged Knife Kneebreaker
shortDescription: An imposing brawler carrying a large club.

features.name: I’ve Got ‘Em
features.description: Characters Restrained by this adversary take double damage from attacks by other adversaries in the scene.
features.flavourText: They have you pinned and you know that’s bad news.

features.name: Hold Them Down
features.description: Make an attack against a target in melee. On a success, they take no damage but are Restrained and Vulnerable. A PC can break free with a Strength (12) roll or are let go automatically when Major damage or higher is dealt to the Bruiser.
features.flavourText: They slam you to the ground with unbelievable strength.

name: Jagged Knife Lackey
shortDescription: A commonly-dressed thief with small daggers, eager to prove themselves.

features.name: Minion
features.description: For every 3 damage a PC deals to this adversary, defeat an additional minion in the attack’s range.
features.flavourText: You cut through them effortlessly, one to the next.

features.name: Group Attack
features.description: Choose a target and activate all Jagged Knife Lackeys within Close range of them. Those minions move into melee with the target and make one shared attack roll. On a success, they deal 3 phy damage each. Combine this damage together.
features.flavourText: They descend on you, stronger together.

name: Jagged Knife Lieutenant
shortDescription: A seasoned bandit in quality leathers with a strong voice and cunning eyes.

features.name: Tactician
features.description: Mark a Stress to activate this adversary and two allies within Close range of them (do not spend additional action tokens for the allies).
features.flavourText: They give the orders, and they’re followed without hesitation.

features.name: More Where That Came From
features.description: Summon 3 Jagged Knife Lackeys, who appear at Far range.
features.flavourText: You see more trouble headed your way.

features.name: Coup de Grace
features.description: +4 Attack modifier. Spend a Fear to make an attack against a Vulnerable target within Close range. If successful, deal 4d8 phy damage and force the target to mark a Stress.
features.flavourText: They see you struggling and move to end this.

name: Jagged Knife Shadow
shortDescription: A nimble scoundrel bearing a wicked knife and utilizing shadow magic to isolate targets.

features.name: Backstab
features.description: On a successful Daggers attack that has advantage, deal 2d10 phy damage instead.
features.flavourText: They exploit your weakness and hit you where it hurts.

features.name: Cloaked
features.description: Become Hidden until after this adversary’s next attack. Any attacks made while Hidden have advantage.
features.flavourText: They can disappear in plain sight.

name: Jagged Knife Sniper
shortDescription: A lanky bandit striking from cover with a shortbow.

features.name: Unseen Strike
features.description: If the Sniper is Hidden when they hit an enemy, the attack deals 1d20 phy instead of their normal damage.
features.flavourText: From the shadows, an arrow with deadly aim flies towards you.

name: Juvenile Flickerfly
shortDescription: A horse-sized insect with iridescent scales and crystalline wings moving faster than the eye can see.

features.name: Relentless
features.description: Flickerfly may activate three times in one GM move (still costs 3 action tokens).

features.name: Never Misses
features.description: Before an attack the Juvenile Flickerfly makes, roll 1d6. On a 4+, the target's Evasion score is halved (rounded up).

features.name: Mind Dance
features.description: Spend a Fear to create a magically dazzling display that grapples the minds of its targets. All creatures within Close range must make an Instinct Reaction Roll (15). On a failure, the target adds a token to the action tracker and the Flickerfly learns a fear the target has.

features.name: Hallucinatory Breath
features.description: Activate the first time the Flickerfly takes damage. When triggered, the Flickerfly breathes hallucinatory gas on all targets in front of them up to Far range. Targets must make an Instinct Reaction Roll (15) or be tormented by fearful hallucinations. Targets whose fears are known to the Flickerfly have disadvantage on this roll. On a failure, the target marks Stress and loses a Hope.

name: Katari Burglar
shortDescription: A cunning thief with acrobatic skill and a flair for the dramatic.

features.name: Quick Hands
features.description: Make a dagger attack against a target in Melee range. On a success, deal 2d8 phy damage and this adversary steals one item or consumable from the target’s inventory.

features.name: Escape Plan
features.description: Spend a Fear to reveal a snare trap set by the Katari Burglar. All targets within Very Close range of the trap must make an Agility Reaction Roll (13) or be pulled off their feet and suspended upside down. They are Vulnerable and Restrained until they get free with a Finesse or Strength Roll (13).

name: Kinekozan Cockatrice
shortDescription: Reptile-fish hybrids that vary in length, armed with powerful jaws.

features.name: Stone Snare
features.description: Spend a Fear to turn an area of stone within close range of the cockatrice into a quicksand-like slurry, slowing anyone who moves through it. Any PCs who attempt to pass through must succeed on an Agility (19) roll or become Ensnared. While Ensnared, the PC is Restrained and Vulnerable.

features.name: Leech Moisture
features.description: Mark Stress to make an attack against an ensnared target in melee. On a success, deal 4d20 mag damage. The cockatrice sinks its mandibles into its victim and sucks all liquids from the flesh around the wound, turning affected areas to stone as it does so. Until their next long rest, they cannot heal Hit Points.

features.name: Keening Dive
features.description: Once this adversary only has 1 HP left, you can mark a Stress to have it keen, discharging large amounts of raw magic and diving into the stone. From there it acts like an aquatic hazard, swimming through the stone. Its difficulty becomes 22.

name: Kraken
shortDescription: A legendary beast of the sea, bigger than the largest galleon, with sucker-laden tentacles and a terrifying maw.

features.name: Relentless
features.description: May activate twice in a GM move.

features.name: Many Tentacles
features.description: When using a Tentacles attack, this adversary can make their attack roll against two targets in range per activation. This feature is inactive while Kraken has 8 or more marked HP.

features.name: Grapple & Drown
features.description: Make an attack roll with a +6 modifier against a target within Close range. If successful, mark a Stress to have the Kraken grab them in one of its tentacles, dragging them beneath the water. They are Restrained and Vulnerable and must mark stress for every action token placed on the tracker until they are no longer grabbed. The target can break free with Strength (16) roll or by the PCs dealing at least Major damage to the Kraken with the intent of freeing the grabbed character.

features.name: Boiling Blast
features.description: Spend a Fear to have the Kraken spew a line of boiling water at any number of targets in a line up to Far range. All targets must make an Agility Reaction Roll (20). On a failure, they take 3d20 physical damage. If they use any number of armor slots to reduce the damage, they must also mark one Stress.

name: Lockdown Automaton
shortDescription: Massive statues placed in precious metals, designed to prevent theft.

features.name: Heavy Pockets
features.description: Spend a Fear to weigh down their opponents by using their wealth against them. Choose a target within close range, for every handful of gold they are holding temporarily reduce their Agility score by 1. This condition ends when they reach Very Far range from the Lockdown Automaton or they drop all their gold.

features.name: Golden Arc
features.description: Mark Stress to make a Massive Sword attack against all enemies within close range. Any targets hit suffer 4d10 phy damage.

features.name: Conductive Metal
features.description: When attacked with magic damage, mark 1 Stress to add 2d8 magic damage to Lockdown Automaton's next attack.

name: Master Assassin
shortDescription: A seasoned killer with a threatening voice and a deadly blade.

features.name: Won’t See It Coming
features.description: Master Assassin deals +10 damage on standard attacks while Hidden.

features.name: Strike as One
features.description: Mark a Stress to activate a number of Assassins equal to the Master Assassin’s unmarked Stress.

features.name: The Subtle Blade
features.description: When Master Assassin successfully makes a Serrated Dagger attack against a character that is Vulnerable, spend a Fear to deal 2 Hit Points instead of rolling.

name: Merchant
shortDescription: A finely dressed trader with a keen eye for profit.

features.name: Preferential Treatment
features.description: A character that succeeds at a social action against the Merchant gains a discount on purchases. Any character that fails on a social action against the merchant must pay more and is at disadvantage on future social actions against the Merchant.
features.flavourText: There’s an added service fee for enemies.

features.name: The Run-Around
features.description: Any Presence roll made against the Merchant below 16 causes the character to mark a Stress.
features.flavourText: You can’t swindle a professional swindler.

name: Minor Chaos Elemental
shortDescription: A coruscating mass of uncontrollable magic.

features.name: Arcane Form
features.description: This adversary is resistant to magic damage.
features.flavourText: You watch as some of your magic is reflected off of the chaos.

features.name: Sickening Flux
features.description: Mark a Hit Point to cause all PCs within Close range to mark a Stress and become Vulnerable until their next short rest or they have a Stress cleared.
features.flavourText: Your stomach drops and your head swims.

features.name: Remake Reality
features.description: Spend a Fear to transform the area within Very Close range into a different biome. Any other creature within this area takes 3d8 direct damage.
features.flavourText: You feel the world twist around you, your mind reeling.

name: Minor Demon
shortDescription: A crimson-hued creature from the realms below, consumed by rage against all mortals.

features.name: All Must Fall
features.description: Any PC that rolls a failure with Fear within a Close distance of Minor Demon loses Hope.
features.flavourText: The world seems to grow darker as the fight becomes more dire.

features.name: Reaper
features.description: When rolling damage, mark a Stress to add the Demon’s current number of marked Hit Points to the value of the damage inflicted.
features.flavourText: As hard as you’ve hit, the demon hits back harder.

features.name: Hellfire
features.description: Spend a Fear to rain hellfire on everything within Far range. All targets within the area must make an Agility Reaction Roll (14) or take 4d8 mag damage. Targets that succeed take half damage.
features.flavourText: You smell smoke as the sky above you fills with streaks of fire.

name: Minor Fire Elemental
shortDescription: A living flame the size of a large bonfire.

features.name: Consume Kindling
features.description: When you move onto any objects that are highly flammable, consume them to clear 1 HP or 1 Stress. You may do this three times a scene.
features.flavourText: The Elemental spits with fire, consuming the barrels beneath it, growing stronger.

features.name: Scorched Earth
features.description: Mark a Stress to choose a point within Far range. The ground within Very Close range of that point immediately bursts into flames. Anyone within this area must make an Agility Reaction Roll (15), or take 2d10 magic damage from the flames. On a success, they take half damage instead.
features.flavourText: The ground glows red hot around you, suddenly bursting into flames.

features.name: Explosion
features.description: Spend a Fear to erupt in a fiery explosion. Make an attack against all targets within Close range. Any you succeed against are thrown back to Far range and take 3d8 direct mag damage.
features.flavourText: A massive, fiery explosion rocks the battlefield.

name: Minor Treant
shortDescription: An ambulatory sapling rising up to defend their forest.

features.name: Minion
features.description: For every 4 damage a PC deals to this adversary, defeat an additional minion in the attack’s range.
features.flavourText: You cut through them effortlessly, one to the next.

features.name: Group Attack
features.description: Choose a target and activate all Minor Treants within Close range of them. Those minions move into melee with the target and make one shared attack roll. On a success, they each deal 4 phy damage.
features.flavourText: They descend on you, stronger together.

name: Minotaur
shortDescription: A massive bull-headed Firbolg with a quick temper.

features.name: Slow
features.description: This adversary costs 2 action tokens to activate.

features.name: Charging Bull
features.description: Mark a Stress to make an attack roll on a group within Very Close range. The Minotaur charges through them, making an attack. Any they succeed against are knocked back to Close range and take 3d10 phy damage. If they are knocked into a solid object or another creature, they take an additional 2d10 phy.

features.name: Gore
features.description: Make an attack against a target within Very Close range, moving the Minotaur into melee with them. On a success, deal 4d10 damage to the target. Armor is only worth half its value against this attack.

name: Mortal Hunter
shortDescription: An undead figure wearing a heavy leather coat, with searching eyes and a casually cruel demeanor.

features.name: Terrifying
features.description: Every time this creature makes a successful attack, all PCs within Far range lose one Hope.

features.name: Deathlock
features.description: Spend a Fear to put a deathlock on a target within Very Close range as the Mortal Hunter binds the target with a necrotic curse. Any attacks made by the Mortal Hunter on a deathlocked target deal direct damage. This creature can only maintain one deathlock at a time.

features.name: Inevitable Death
features.description: Mark Stress to activate 1d4 adversaries under the Mortal Hunter’s control. They deal half damage with any attacks made in these activations.

features.name: Rampage
features.description: Activate when a hostile target is spotted. When triggered, move in a straight line to somewhere in Far range, and make an attack with a +3 modifier against all enemies in the path. Deal 2d20 physical damage to any you succeed against.

name: Oracle of Doom
shortDescription: A towering immortal and incarnation of fate, cursed to only see bad outcomes.

features.name: Terrible Knowledge
features.description: The Oracle of Doom instantly knows a personal nightmare of every mortal that comes within their sight.

features.name: Vengeful Fate
features.description: Any time this adversary marks HP from an attacker within Very Close range, mark a Stress to send the attacker flying back to Far range, dealing them 5d10 phy damage. Damaged targets may mark a Stress to make an Agility Reaction Roll (20) to take half damage instead.

features.name: Walls Closing In
features.description: Any time a target within Very Far of Oracle of Doom rolls a failure, they mark a Stress.

features.name: Pronounce Fate
features.description: Spend a Fear to present a target within Far range with a vision of their personal nightmare. The target must make a Knowledge Reaction Roll (20) or lose all Hope and take 3d20+10 magic damage that cannot be reduced by armor. On a success, they take half damage and lose only 1 Hope.

features.name: Summon Tormentors
features.description: Summon 2d4 minions relevant to one of the PC’s personal nightmares at Close range to the PC (Tier 2 or below). This can only be performed once per party member.

name: Outer Realms Abomination
shortDescription: A chaotic mockery of life, constantly in flux.

features.name: Chaotic Form
features.description: Each time this adversary attacks, roll 2d4 and use that as their attack modifier (as reflected in the attack modifier section).

features.name: Disorienting Presence
features.description: Targets damaged by this adversary must make an Instinct Reaction Roll (17). On a failure, they immediately place a token on the action tracker.

features.name: Unreal Form
features.description: When this adversary takes damage, reduce that damage by 1d20.

features.name: Reality Quake
features.description: Spend a Fear to rattle the edges of reality near this adversary. All targets within Far range must make a Knowledge Reaction Roll (20). Any who fail become un-stuck from reality until the end of the scene. While an un-stuck target spends Hope or Armor Slots or marks Hit Points or Stress, they must always spend/mark double the amount. Targets that succeed mark a Stress.

name: Outer Realms Corruptor
shortDescription: A chaotic mockery of life, constantly in flux.

features.name: Will-Shattering Touch
features.description: Targets damaged by Outer Realms Corrupter lose a Hope.

features.name: Disgorge Reality Flotsam
features.description: Mark a Stress to spew partially-digested portions of consumed realities at all targets within Close range. Targets must make a Knowledge Reaction Roll (18). Any that fail mark 2 Stress.

name: Outer Realms Thrall
shortDescription: Vaguely-humanoid forms stripped of memory and identity.

features.name: Minion
features.description: For every 12 damage a PC deals to this adversary, defeat an additional minion in the attack’s range.
features.flavourText: You cut through them effortlessly, one to the next.

features.name: Group Attack
features.description: Choose a target and activate all Outer Realm Thralls within Close range of them. Those minions move into melee with the target and make one shared attack roll. On a success, they deal 7 phy damage each. Combine this damage together.
features.flavourText: They descend on you, stronger together.

name: Petty Noble
shortDescription: A richly-dressed and adorned aristocrat brimming with hubris.

features.name: My Land, My Rules
features.description: All social actions against the Petty Noble on their land are made at disadvantage.
features.flavourText: "You’re a guest in my home!"

features.name: Guards, Seize Them!
features.description: Once per scene, mark a Stress to summon 1d4 Bladed Guards to enforce the Noble’s will.
features.flavourText: "You had no idea the suits of armor lining the hall were guards."

features.name: Exile
features.description: Long-Term Countdown 6. Activate when Petty Noble becomes hostile to a target. When the countdown triggers, exile the target and their close associates from the noble’s territory. While exiled, the target has disadvantage in all social situations within the Noble’s domain.
features.flavourText: "Be gone!"

name: Pirate Captain
shortDescription: A charismatic sea dog with an impressive hat, eager to raid and plunder.

features.name: Swashbuckler
features.description: Any incoming damage below 14 causes the attacker to mark a Stress.
features.flavourText: You begin to realize: you might not win this fight.

features.name: Reinforcements
features.description: Mark a Stress to summon a Pirate Raiders Horde that enters at Far range. This can only be done once per scene.
features.flavourText: The captain whistles, and more pirates pour out from the ship’s hold.

features.name: No Quarter
features.description: Spend a Fear to choose a target who has more than two pirates within melee range of them. The pirates all begin hurling threats and promises of a watery grave. The target must make a Presence Reaction Roll (16) or suffer 1d4 Stress. They still mark a Stress on a success.
features.flavourText: This is a battle of blades and of insults, it seems.

name: Pirate Raiders
shortDescription: Seafaring scoundrels moving in a ravaging pack.

features.name: Swashbuckler
features.description: Any incoming damage below 11 causes the attacker to mark Stress.
features.flavourText: You begin to realize: you might not win this fight.

features.name: Horde
features.description: If a Pirate Raider has marked 2 or more of its HP, they deal 2d4 phy instead of their normal damage.
features.flavourText: With their numbers dwindling, they don’t pose as much of a threat.

name: Pirate Tough
shortDescription: A formidable pirate with immense strength and a penchant for raiding and terrorizing.

features.name: Swashbuckler
features.description: Any incoming damage below 14 causes the attacker to mark a Stress.
features.flavourText: You begin to realize: you might not win this fight.

features.name: Clear The Decks
features.description: Make an attack against a target within Very Close range. On a success, mark a Stress to move into melee with them and deal 2d12 +2 damage. The target is then thrown back to a Close distance.
features.flavourText: The ship rocks, sending you sprawling.

name: Red Ooze
shortDescription: A moving mound of translucent flaming red slime.

features.name: Creeping Fire
features.description: This adversary can only move Very Close range when it activates. It lights any flammable object it touches on fire.
features.flavourText: It creeps towards you, the ground around it erupting into flames.

features.name: Ignite
features.description: Make an attack against a target in Very Close range. On a success, they burst into flames, taking 2d8 mag damage immediately and 1d6 direct magic damage every time a token is placed on the action tracker. This ends when they are extinguished with a Finesse Roll (14).
features.flavourText: You feel fire at your feet, and suddenly, you’re engulfed.

features.name: Split
features.description: When this adversary marks its 3rd Hit Point, spend a Fear to split it into two Tiny Red Oozes (with no marked Hit Points or Stress). They may immediately activate without spending tokens.
features.flavourText: You watch as the damage you’ve done splits it in half… becoming two oozes instead of one.

name: Rotted Zombie
shortDescription: A decaying corpse ambling toward its prey.

features.name: Minion
features.description: For every 4 damage a PC deals to this adversary, defeat an additional minion in the attack’s range.
features.flavourText: You hack through multiple bodies in the tight press of the undead.

features.name: Group Attack
features.description: Choose a target and activate all Rotten Zombies within Close range of them. Those minions move into melee with the target and make one shared attack roll. On a success, they deal 3 phy damage each. Combine this damage together.
features.flavourText: Though zombies move forward mindlessly, seeming to attack in a coordinated effort of instinct.

name: Sellsword
shortDescription: An armed mercenary testing their luck.

features.name: Minion
features.description: For every 4 damage a PC deals to this adversary, defeat an additional minion in the attack’s range.
features.flavourText: You cut through them effortlessly, one to the next.

features.name: Group Attack
features.description: Choose a target and activate all Sellswords within Close range of them. Those minions move into melee with the target and make one shared attack roll. On a success, they deal 4 phy damage each. Combine this damage together.
features.flavourText: They descend on you, stronger together.

name: Shambling Zombie
shortDescription: An animated corpse that moves shakily, driven only by hunger.

features.name: Too Many to Handle
features.description: If Shambling Zombie is in melee range with an opponent and at least one other Zombie is within Close range, all attacks against that opponent have advantage.
features.flavourText: You no longer know where to look as more zombies surround you.

features.name: Horrifying
features.description: When this creature deals hit point damage to a target, the target also loses a Hope. If the target doesn’t have any Hope, they mark an additional Hit Point instead.
features.flavourText: A cold shiver goes down your spine as you face off against the corpse of someone you knew.

name: Skeleton Archer
shortDescription: A clattering pile of bones.

features.name: Opportunist
features.description: When two or more adversaries are very close to a target, all damage the archer deals to them is doubled.
features.flavourText: Seeing their opportunity, they pull back and let loose an arrow.

features.name: Deadly Shot
features.description: +2 Attack Modifier. Make an attack against a Vulnerable target within Far range. On a success, mark a Stress to deal 2d10 damage.
features.flavourText: Their arrow finds you, exploiting your vulnerability to sink itself deep.

name: Skeleton Dredge
shortDescription: A clattering pile of bones.

features.name: Minion
features.description: For every 4 damage a PC deals to this adversary, defeat an additional minion in the attack’s range.
features.flavourText: You cut through them effortlessly, one to the next.

features.name: Group Attack
features.description: Choose a target and activate all Skeleton Dredges within Close range of them. Those minions move into melee with the target and make one shared attack roll. On a success, they deal 3 phy damage each. Combine this damage together.
features.flavourText: They descend on you, stronger together.

name: Skeleton Knight
shortDescription: A dirt-covered skeleton armed with a rusted blade.

features.name: Cut to the Bone
features.description: +2 Attack Modifier. Mark a Stress to make a Rusty Greatsword attack against all enemies within Very Close range. On a success, they deal 2d8 phy and the PC marks a Stress.
features.flavourText: They swing their sword around them with unexpected power.

features.name: Dig Two Graves
features.description: +2 Attack Modifier. When this adversary is killed, before it dies, it makes an attack against an enemy within Very Close range (prioritizing the enemy that killed it). On success, the target takes 2d10 phy damage and loses 1d4 Hope.
features.flavourText: With its last moment of strength, the bone knight strikes out at you.

name: Skeleton Warrior
shortDescription: A dirt-covered skeleton armed with a rusted blade.

features.name: Only Bones
features.description: This creature is resistant to physical damage.
features.flavourText: Your weapon slides through their ribs, no skin to pierce.

features.name: Won’t Stay Dead
features.description: After this adversary has marked its last hit point, you may still activate it to roll 1d6. On a 6, if there are any other adversaries still on the battlefield, this adversary reforms itself and returns to battle with no hit points marked.
features.flavourText: The pile of bones reforms itself, rising up to fight again.

name: Spellblade
shortDescription: A mercenary combining their skills in swordplay and magic to deadly effect.

features.name: Arcane Steel
features.description: Damage dealt by the Empowered Longsword is considered both physical and magic.
features.flavourText: Their blade glows with an otherworldly sheen.

features.name: Suppressing Blast
features.description: Mark a Stress and target a group within Far range. They must make an Agility Reaction (13) or take 2d12 mag damage. Add a token to the action tracker for each target that marked HP on this attack.
features.flavourText: The magical blast ricochets towards you, knocking the wind out of your lungs.

features.name: Move As A Unit
features.description: Spend a Fear to activate the Spellblade and up to five allied units within Far range.
features.flavourText: With sword raised high, they lead the charge towards you.

name: Stag Knight
shortDescription: A mystical guardian of the forest, wielding a bramble sword and adorned with natural armor.

features.name: Canopy Dive
features.description: When this adversary attacks from a height advantage, deal 6d6+15 damage on a success.
features.flavourText: The Stag Knight uses the high ground to its advantage, striking with devastating force.

features.name: Thorny Armor
features.description: When a creature attacks this adversary in Melee range, make them take 2d12+9 direct physical damage.
features.flavourText: The natural armor of the Stag Knight retaliates against attackers with piercing thorns.

features.name: Blade of the Forest
features.description: When this adversary is Very Close to at least two other adversaries, make an attack against a target in melee range. On a hit, it deals physical damage equal to the target’s Major threshold + 2d12.
features.flavourText: The Stag Knight harnesses the collective strength of the forest's defenders.

name: Stilt Scorpions
shortDescription: Large scorpions that track and ambush their prey.

features.name: Out of the Shadows
features.description: On the first attack a Stilt Scorpion makes against a target, their attack modifier is increased by +3.

features.name: Stinger
features.description: Make an attack against a target within Very Close range. On a success, deal 5d10+5 phy.

name: Strix-Wolf
shortDescription: A wolf-owl pack hunter with wings and a rotating head.

features.name: Pack Tactics
features.description: When making a Bite & Claw attack, if another Strix-Wolf is also in melee range of the target, deal 2d8+2 phy damage instead.
features.flavourText: When they work in packs, they're more bold, more vicious.

features.name: Powerful Senses
features.description: This creature ignores the Hidden condition on anyone within close range

features.name: Fly
features.description: Mark Stress to make the Strix-Wolf take flight, increasing their Difficulty by +2 and making their attacks worth +2 damage until the Strix-Wolf lands.

name: Swarm of Rats
shortDescription: A skittering mass of ordinary rodents moving as one like a ravenous wave.

features.name: In Your Face
features.description: All enemies in melee range of the swarm of rats have disadvantage on against any target other than the horde.
features.flavourText: They swarm you, pulling your focus from anything but them.

features.name: Horde
features.description: Once 4 HP are marked on the horde, they only do 2d4 on their Claws attack.
features.flavourText: With their numbers dwindling, they don’t pose as much of a threat.

name: Sylvan Soldier
shortDescription: A faerie warrior adorned in leaf & bark armor.

features.name: Pack Tactics
features.description: When making a Scythe attack, if another Sylvan Soldier is also in melee range of the target, deal 2d10 phy damage instead.
features.flavourText: When they work in packs, they’re more bold, more vicious.

features.name: Forest Control
features.description: Spend a Fear to pull down a tree within Close range. Anyone the tree might hit on its way down must make an Agility Reaction (15) or take 1d20 phy damage.
features.flavourText: They extend vines from their hands and pull the tree down with a crash.

features.name: Blend In
features.description: After a successful attack, mark a Stress to become Hidden until this adversary’s next attack or a PC makes an Instinct Roll (14) to find them.
features.flavourText: When you look up from the attack, they are gone…

name: Tiny Green Ooze
shortDescription: A small moving mound of translucent green slime.

features.name: Acidic Form
features.description: Any successful melee attacks this creature makes also marks an Armor Slot on the target. This doesn’t reduce any damage.
features.flavourText: The residue eats away at your armor, corroding it slowly.

name: Tiny Red Ooze
shortDescription: A small moving mound of translucent flaming red slime.

features.name: Burning
features.description: Any creature that damages this adversary from melee range takes 2d6 direct magic damage.
features.flavourText: As you strike the ooze, you feel a flash of red hot heat wash over you.

name: Toxic Hog
shortDescription: Poisonous beast bristling with hair and a bad attitude.

features.name: Charges Like a Train
features.description: The charge of a Toxic Hog hits like a freight train. When charging a PC, spend a Fear to slam the player back into far range. When they land, they take 1d10+2 phy damage.

features.name: Bristles
features.description: Mark a Stress when Toxic Hog is hit by an attack from within very close range. Immediately make a counterattack using their poisonous bristles. On a success, deal 3d8+4 phy damage. A PC hit by these bristles must also mark a Stress from the poison when they act until their next roll with Hope.

name: Vampire
shortDescription: An intelligent undead with blood-stained lips and a predator’s smile.

features.name: Mistform
features.description: When taking physical damage, this adversary can mark Stress to make a Reaction Roll (13). On a success, they only take half damage from the attack.

features.name: Draining Bite
features.description: Make an attack on a target in melee to bite their neck. On a success, the target takes 3d10 phy. A target that marks HP from this attack loses a Hope and marks a Stress, then the Vampire clears 1 HP.

name: Vaultgeist
shortDescription: The covetous ghost of a rich person bound to their hoard.

features.name: Loose Gold
features.description: During this encounter there may be preexisting piles of Loose Gold or ones created by the vaultgeist. Assign an HP value to these equal to the amount of handfuls of gold they are comprised of. The vaultgeist can absorb up to 5 HP beyond its maximum.

features.name: Hostile Acquisition
features.description: Mark Stress to suck in the wealth around this adversary to heal it. All PCs within close range holding gold must make reaction roll with Strength (16) to hold onto their money. Failure results in the loss of up to 1 handful of gold. The vaultgeist heals 1 HP for every handful of gold stolen in this way. Vaultgeist also absorbs other gold as per the Loose Gold feature, gaining HP equivalent to its value.

features.name: Fiscal Irresponsibility
features.description: Spend 2 HP to shift this adversary’s form into a heavy orb of gold coins, making an attack roll to smash down on a target within very close range. On a success, deal 4d10+8 phy damage. This creates a pile of Loose Gold worth 1 handful on top of the target.

features.name: Covetous Howl
features.description: Mark a Stress to emit a howl that causes all gold within close range to vibrate violently until the Vaultgeist is defeated. Each creature within range that has gold can take 1 damage for each handful they’re holding, or choose to cut their coin purses loose, creating a pile of Loose Gold at their feet (that the Vaultgeist can use for HP).

features.name: Miserly End
features.description: Upon its death, the vast treasure hoard comprising the vaultgeist tarnishes to worthless tin, but any gold stolen during the encounter is available to take.

name: Volcanic Dragon: Ashen Tyrant
shortDescription: A formidable dragon that embodies the destructive power of a volcano, feared for its fiery and relentless attacks.

features.name: Relentless
features.description: This adversary may activate four times in a GM move.

features.name: Injured Wings
features.description: Attack rolls against this creature while it is flying are at +1 difficulty.

features.name: Fiery Death
features.description: Whenever a target within Close distance of Volcanic Dragon rolls a failure, they lose a Hope. If they can’t, they mark a Hit Point.

features.name: Desperate Rampage
features.description: Mark a Stress to make an attack against all targets within Close range. Any target hit by this attack takes 4d12 phy damage, marks Stress, and is knocked back to Close range.

features.name: Ashen Cloud
features.description: Spend a Fear to smash the ground and kick up ash everywhere within Far range. Ranged attacks through this area are at disadvantage. Any creature taking an action within the ash cloud adds two tokens to the action tracker. This cloud clears the next time the GM spends every token on the action tracker.

features.name: Apocalyptic Thrashing
features.description: Spend a Fear to activate. This ticks down every time a token is placed on the action tracker. When triggered, Ashen Tyrant thrashes about, causing environmental damage (earthquake, avalanche, collapsing walls, etc.) All targets within Far range must make a Strength Reaction Roll (22) or suffer 4d20 phy damage and become Restrained in the rubble. Any restrained targets can break free with Strength (25). Targets that succeed only take half damage and are not Restrained.

name: Volcanic Dragon: Molten Scourge
shortDescription: Enraged by their wounds, the dragon bursts into molten lava.

features.name: Relentless
features.description: This adversary may activate three times in a GM move.

features.name: Shattering Might
features.description: Mark a Stress to attack a target within Very Close range. If successful, it deals 10d6+10 phy damage. Creatures hit by Shattering Might are knocked away to Close range and add a token to the action tracker.

features.name: Volcanic Breath
features.description: Any time this adversary is dealt Major damage, roll 1d10. On an 8+, this creature breathes a flow of lava on all targets in front of them within Far range. They must make a Reaction roll using Agility (21). On a failure, they take 3d20 phy damage, mark 1d4 Stress, and are Vulnerable until they clear a Stress. On a success, they take half damage and mark 1 Stress.

features.name: Eruption
features.description: Spend a Fear to erupt lava from beneath this adversary’s scales, filling the area in Very Close range around them with molten stone. Any targets in that area must make an Agility Reaction Roll (22) or take 4d20+8 phy damage and be pushed out into Close range. This area remains lava that deals 4d20+8 damage to anyone who enters it until the battle is over.

features.name: Lava Splash
features.description: Whenever Molten Scourge takes Severe Damage, molten blood gushes forth from the wound and hits the attacker if they are within Very Close range, dealing 6d6 phy damage.

features.name: Cracked Scales
features.description: Any time Volcanic Dragon takes damage, it reduces that damage by 1d8.

features.name: Ashen Vengeance (Phase Change)
features.description: When Molten Scourge marks their last HP, replace them with Ashen Tyrant. Spend a Fear to have them activate immediately.

name: Volcanic Dragon: Obsidian Predator
shortDescription: A massive winged creature with obsidian scales and impossibly sharp claws.

features.name: Relentless
features.description: This adversary may activate two times in a GM move.

features.name: Flying
features.description: Attack rolls against this creature, while it is flying, are at +3 difficulty.

features.name: Avalanche Tail
features.description: Mark a Stress to make a tail attack against all targets within Close range. Any hit by Avalanche Tail take 2d20 phy damage and are knocked back to Close range, becoming Vulnerable until their next roll with Hope.

features.name: Divebomb
features.description: If this adversary is flying, mark a Stress to pick a spot within Far range. Make an attack against all targets within Very Close range of that spot. Any you succeed against take 3d20+5 phy damage. Targets hit by Divebomb also mark a Stress and lose a Hope.

features.name: Obsidian Scales
features.description: Any time Obsidian Predator takes damage, it reduces that damage by 2d8.

features.name: Erupting Rage (Phase Change)
features.description: When Obsidian Predator marks their last HP, replace them with Molten Scourge. Spend a Fear to have them activate immediately.

name: Weaponmaster
shortDescription: A Mercenary with a greatsword

features.name: Goading Strike
features.description: Make a Greatsword attack and mark Stress to taunt the target. The next time the taunted target acts, if they attack anyone other than the Weaponmaster, it's with disadvantage.
features.flavourText: They smile at you with venom in their eyes. ‘Come get me.’

features.name: Adrenaline Burst
features.description: Spend a Fear once per scene to heal 2 HP and 2 Stress.
features.flavourText: They wipe the blood from their face and look up at you, revelling in the challenge.

name: Young Dryad
shortDescription: An imperious tree-person leading their forest’s defenses.

features.name: Voice of the Forest
features.description: Mark a Stress to activate 1d4 allies in range of a target they can immediately hit. Their attacks deal half damage.
features.flavourText: When they work in packs, they’re more bold, more vicious.

features.name: Thorny Cage
features.description: Spend a Fear to form a cage around a target within Very Close range that makes them Restrained. Any action taken against the cage marks a Stress. The target can be broken free with successful Strength Roll (15).
features.flavourText: A cage of thorns and vines wraps around you, holding you in place.

name: Young Ice Dragon
shortDescription: A glacier-blue dragon with frost-tinged wings, known for its chilling presence and devastating attacks.

features.name: Relentless
features.description: Young Ice Dragon may activate three times in one GM move.

features.name: Rend and Crush
features.description: All damage where armor slots are not used to reduce it also deal a Stress.

features.name: Terrifying
features.description: Any character that rolls a result with Fear within Far range of this adversary loses a Hope.

features.name: Blizzard Breath
features.description: All creatures in front of the Young Ice Dragon within Close range must make an Agility Reaction Roll (18). On a failure, they take 3d20 magic damage and become Restrained by shards of ice until they break free by rolling with Strength (18). Targets that succeed on the Reaction Roll must mark 2 Stress or take half damage. This uses all three of this adversary’s activations.

features.name: Avalanche
features.description: Spend a Fear to have the Dragon unleash a huge downfall of snow and ice, covering all targets within Far range. All PCs within the area must make an Instinct Reaction Roll (18) or be buried in snow and rocks, becoming Vulnerable until the next time they act. Each target that fails the roll also adds a token to the action tracker.

features.name: Frozen Scales
features.description: Targets hit by one of the Young Ice Dragon’s attacks are chilled, giving them disadvantage on Attack Rolls until their next short rest.

name: Zombie Horde
shortDescription: A group of shambling corpses instinctively moving together.

features.name: Overwhelm
features.description: When a creature within melee range deals 1 HP to the Zombie Horde, you may mark a Stress to have the Zombie Horde immediately make an attack against that creature.
features.flavourText: The zombie's numbers seem insurmountable.

features.name: Horde
features.description: If the Zombie Pack has 3 or more of their Hit Points marked, their attack only deals 2d6 damage.
features.flavourText: With their numbers dwindling, they don’t pose as much of a threat.

name: Zombie Legion
shortDescription: A massive, relentless horde of zombies.

features.name: Unyielding
features.description: Zombie Legion has resistance to physical damage.

features.name: Relentless
features.description: Zombie Legion may activate twice in a GM move (still takes two action tokens).

features.name: Overwhelm
features.description: When a creature within melee distance deals damage to Zombie Legion but it does not cause Zombie Legion to mark Hit Points, spend a Fear to have Zombie Pack immediately make an attack against that creature with advantage.

features.name: Horde 5d6
features.description: If Zombie Legion has half or more of its Hit Points marked, its attack only deals 5d6 damage.
